item.title: Nested-GridView
item.description: A Nested-GridView is a GridView control inside the grid row of the parent GridView control. Syntax # <asp:GridView ID=“gvParent” runat=“server”></asp:GridView> <asp:GridView ID=“gvChild” runat=“server”></asp:GridView> Parameters # gvParent It is a parent gridview control which contains a child gridview like gvChild control and other controls in gridview row like Labels, Buttons etc. gvChild It is a child gridview control that can also contain some other controls like in parent gridview. It will be nested in gvParent gridview control.
